name: HatMania
description:
HatMania is a retro top down multitasking platformer with a twist. Two companions are trapped in a dungeon by a mysterious foe. In order to escape they must take different routes, but their fates remain bound to each other. To succesfully guide them through the treacherous dungeon, you must split your attention and navigate both at the same time.



In 50 fun bite-sized levels our unfortunate companions must dodge dangerous traps, sneak past wicked foes, and solve cryptic puzzles in order to get back home.
